## Multiple Imputation
```{r}
ini <- mice(dfinc, maxit = 0)
meth <- ini$method
meth["bmi"] <- "~ I(weight / (height / 100)^2)"
```


```{r}
imp1 <- mice(dfinc,
             m = 5,
             maxit = 20,
             method = meth,
             seed = 12345,
             print = FALSE)
dfcomI <- complete(imp1,1)
dfcomI
```

## Evaluation
```{r}
modelFit <- with(imp1, lm(active ~ rest + bmi + sex + smoke + intensity))
summary(pool(modelFit))
```

```{r}
diff <- data.frame(age = integer())

mAge <- dfcomI$age[dfisNA$age == TRUE]
tAge <- dfcom$age[dfisNA$age == TRUE]
mSmoke <- dfcomI$smoke[dfisNA$smoke == TRUE]
tSmoke <- dfcom$smoke[dfisNA$smoke == TRUE]
mSex <- dfcomI$sex[dfisNA$sex == TRUE]
tSex <- dfcom$sex[dfisNA$sex == TRUE]
mIntensity <- dfcomI$intensity[dfisNA$intensity == TRUE]
tIntensity <- dfcom$intensity[dfisNA$intensity == TRUE]
mActivity <- dfcomI$active[dfisNA$active == TRUE]
tActivity <- dfcom$active[dfisNA$active == TRUE]
mRest <- dfcomI$rest[dfisNA$rest == TRUE]
tRest <- dfcom$rest[dfisNA$rest == TRUE]
mHeight <- dfcomI$height[dfisNA$height == TRUE]
tHeight <- dfcom$height[dfisNA$height == TRUE]
mWeight <- dfcomI$weight[dfisNA$weight == TRUE]
tWeight <- dfcom$weight[dfisNA$weight == TRUE]
mBmi <- dfcomI$bmi[dfisNA$bmi == TRUE]
tBmi <- dfcom$bmi[dfisNA$bmi == TRUE]
```

```{r}
test.com.active<- tActivity
pred.com.error <- tActivity - mActivity
pred.com.R2=1-sum(pred.com.error^2)/sum((test.com.active- mean(test.com.active))^2)
eval.com <- c(sse(tActivity, mActivity), rse(tActivity, mActivity), rmse(tActivity, mActivity), pred.com.R2)

eval.com
 
```
